tests.test_Standardmidifile のソースコード

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-


import unittest
from pathlib import Path

# test class standardmidifile
from src.audioworkstation.libs.sublibs import standardmidifile as SMF



[ドキュメント]class TestSMF(unittest.TestCase):

[ドキュメント]    def setUp(self) -> None:
        midifilename = "mid/R01698G2.mid"
        # title='usseiwa'
        fo = Path(midifilename)
        self.midifile = SMF.StandardMidiFile(fo)
        return super().setUp()



[ドキュメント]    def test_channels_preset(self) -> None:
        self.assertEqual(self.midifile.channels_preset()[0], 22)



[ドキュメント]    def test_title(self) -> None:
        self.assertEqual(self.midifile.title(), "usseiwa")



[ドキュメント]    def test_instruments(self) -> None:
        self.assertEqual(self.midifile.instruments(), [])



[ドキュメント]    def test_lyrics(self) -> None:
        self.assertEqual(self.midifile.lyrics(), [])



[ドキュメント]    def test_total_tick(self) -> None:
        self.assertEqual(self.midifile.total_tick(), 295600)



if __name__ == "__main__":
    unittest.main()
